title: Golimaare Gangsteru Lyrics Rowthiram Songs lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Vallavan
Lyrics: Gokul 
Music: Prakash Nkki
Song: Golimaare
Movie: Rowthiram

Maama kanji pona booyi ellam 
Vattraadh anadhiya parthu aarudhal adayum
Andha Nadhiye kaanji poitta
Maama ..
Maama ...

Golimaare gangsteru, goli soda boosteru
Thaaraumaara basteru,daddy daddy manthra bedi
Vera maari youngstaru, fastu mathi vastaaru
Venam maama 5 star-u, anty anty one more 90

Allu allu asaalta allu, Fullu fullu ollumuku fullu
Thirmirudhu thimiridhu enga ooru thimiridhu
Eguruthu Eguruthu enna oru  aeguruthu

Kaatadha style-u confirm-ah polalu
adingada visilu, kiliyatum sevulu
Vazhapazham gapla pzhapazham vipparaam
Varasolla posolla ivar vandhu nottuvaaram

Golimaare gangsteru, goli soda boosteru
Thaaraumaara basteru,daddy daddy manthra bedi
Vera maari youngstaru, fastu mathi vastaaru
Venam maama 5 star-u, anty anty one more 90

Egatu velayula dhigula kaatithan
Bathila pethutan nammaalu
Thaarumarula aerumaaraa thaan 
Aeruvaadiyila settile
Toll gate-ula maasa kaatithan 
Kaasu kattala appete
Basin bridgela base vayisula
..adha eppdika en vaayala soluven

Labathiba lavathiba north madraasu
Tappu tippnu silence aachu
Kathivaakathula semma thittu
Kaiya vachaven namma settu
ambalatata vaayil alla tastu
aari pochuna adhuvum vestu
Alari pochuda east-u west-u
Aalu ariya anna anna bestu

Roundu rounda aethikinnu soundu sounda pesikinu
....urra urra dei
Case-u case-a kudichikinu kaasu keta kalandukinu
odra odra dei..urra urra

Paati sutta vada kaaka thookala 
nekka thukitom kaakava kaakava
Athiril nikkkum podhu athire varaadha 
anna airoplane otraaru otraaru

Goli soda goli soda kumuritaanda kumuritaanda
Adichvan namma aaluda, adanga maatom naangada
posakalasu ellorayum velasu,annaru style-a ninnaru
Under ware-a kilichitaaru,
Under wolrd don ..Under ware gone

Golimaare gangsteru, goli soda boosteru
Thaaraumaara basteru,daddy daddy manthra bedi
Vera maari youngstaru, fastu mathi vastaaru
Venam maama 5 star-u, anty anty one more 90
